column4: anyone know what command I need to use to access my already install ubuntu system from the Live CD?

i apologize for my shorthard. start grub by running `grub`. you will see the "grub>" prompt. then type "root(hd0,0)", if that is fine, then your boot partition is on sda1. then go ahead and type "setup(hd0)". if that is fine, your MBR is fixed. type Ctrl-D. you're done
